reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: This award strives to help foreign partners professionalize their military forces through educational programs and technical support, ensuring that their force can develop and maintain the requisite capacity to effectively carry out its military mission through reliance on discipline, accountability, effective professional standards, and technical expertise. More specifically, this includes Delivery Address: BIR Base Camp in Salak outside the airport in Maroua Notify party: American Embassy Yaounde Cameroon Avenue Rosa Parks ATTN : Office of Security Cooperation (YNC Erik Neet). Delivery Address: HELIOS -RASS-BIR BASTOS 23 STREET BP 20072 YAOUNDE Attn: Captain Bertrand Mbang Notify party: American Embassy Yaounde Cameroon Avenue Rosa Parks ATTN : Office of Security Cooperation (YNC Erik Neet).

Through educational programs and technical support, help foreign partners professionalize their military forces, ensuring that their force can develop and maintain the requisite capacity to effectively carry out its military mission through reliance on discipline, accountability, effective professional standards, and technical expertise. In addition, activities assist foreign partners so that their military forces reliably demonstrate consistent support for adherence to norms of human rights; support the concept of civilian executive authority/control of the military; and have the capacity for institutional and security sector reform.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: U.S. engagement in Cameroon seeks to advance regional peace while encouraging development by strengthening healthcare systems. Foreign assistance contributes towards achieving these objectives by implementing programs that seek to strengthen the national response to the HIV/AIDS pandemic and increase the professionalism and effectiveness of Cameroon's military forces.
Original - OTH GOVT AG CONTR SV

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform
